title: News: Stream Panda Bear's Tomboy
body:
[](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6283-news-stream-panda-bears-tomboy/attachment/panda-bear-tomboy)[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/Panda-Bear-Tomboy1-650x650.jpg "Panda-Bear-Tomboy")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6283-news-stream-panda-bears-tomboy/attachment/panda-bear-tomboy-2)  

After a record such as _Person Pitch_, the anticipation for the follow up, _Tomboy_, was always going to be huge. The record will drop on _April 12_, but as of this morning you won’t have to wait that long, as [NPR](http://www.npr.org) have to decided to stream it on their website. Not a bad Monday afternoon surprise right? Click the link bellow to check the LP out.

[Panda Bear’s Tomboy](http://www.npr.org/2011/04/03/134987319/first-listen-panda-bear-tomboy)

excerpt.full: After a record such as Person Pitch, the anticipation for the follow up, Tomboy, was always going to be huge. The record will drop on April 12, but as of this morning you won’t have to wait that long, as NPR have to decided to stream it on their website. Not a bad Monday afternoon \[…\]
